entry.title: Limelight 0.34 (build 763)
entry.content:
First version with autoupdate
New way to arrange windows

entry.title: Limelight 0.35 (build 842)
entry.content: Correctly reveals a file in finder on OS X

entry.title: Limelight 0.36 (build 845)
entry.content: Bug fix to restore fullscreen toggle when double clicking display

entry.title: Limelight 0.37 (build 848)
entry.content:
Bug fix that stopped it working on platforms other than OSX
Bug fix to allow autoupdate to work on windows
Bug fix to allow autoupdate to work with directories with spaces

entry.title: Limelight 0.38 (build 850)
entry.content: Bug fix that stopped files/links opening on OSX

entry.title: Limelight 0.39 (build 950)
entry.content:
Can now export slides as images to Documents folder (warning this will overwrite files of the same name)
Beginings of PDF support (Very experimental)

entry.title: Limelight 0.40 (build 954)
entry.content:
Can now choose the folder to export slides to
Also fixed the bug for when exporting and nothing on the screen

entry.title: Limelight 0.41 (build 963)
entry.content:
Bug fix that was stopping exporting of a single file to work
Bug fix that was stopping right click menu on songs directory from working

entry.title: Limelight 0.42 (build 1077)
entry.content:
Basic image handling added
PDF support improved, but still experimental

entry.title: Limelight 0.43 (build 1127)
entry.content:
Fix opening and saving of playlist
Improvements to song filtering

entry.title: Limelight 0.44 (build 1140)
entry.content: Images now maintain aspect ratio when displayed

entry.title: Limelight 0.45 (build 1144)
entry.content: Advanced naming when exporting slides

entry.title: Limelight 0.46 (build 1148)
entry.content: Now blanks the screen correctly for images

entry.title: Limelight 0.47 (build 1227)
entry.content:
Powerpoint Integration (No 2007 or Embeded Videos)
Slide backgrounds maintain aspect ratio

entry.title: Limelight 0.48 (build 1257)
entry.content:
Better handling of missing folders
Correctly resizes split pane

entry.title: Limelight 0.49 (build 1268)
entry.content: Bugfix for when the extension is capitalised

entry.title: Limelight 0.50 (build 1269)
entry.content: Remove some testing code that made it into 0.49

entry.title: Limelight 0.51 (build 1307)
entry.content:
Can now drag multiple files (add/rearrange/remove)
Experimental support for pptx 2007, will update lbrary when Apache POI updates

entry.title: Limelight 0.52 (build 1341)
entry.content: Added a search feature that searches filename and text content across all files in all folders in the left pane

entry.title: Limelight 0.53 (build 1346)
entry.content:
Bug fixes introduces in 0.52
Fix Large view
Fix hiding of clear cross on search/filter

entry.title: Limelight 0.54 (build 1443)
entry.content: Added apple remote functionality - thanks for the idea Anna

entry.title: Limelight 0.55 (build 1458)
entry.content: Improvements to Apple Remote functionality

entry.title: Limelight 0.56 (build 1464)
entry.content: Correct aspect ratio of compact/large windows on Mac OSX

entry.title: Limelight 0.57 (build 1476)
entry.content:
Added export selected command
Added check for if the user clicks cancel when exporting slides

entry.title: Limelight 0.58 (build 1499)
entry.content: Fixed keyboard shortcuts

entry.title: Limelight 0.59 (build 1522)
entry.content: Saves last position of window

entry.title: Limelight 0.60 (build 1575)
entry.content: Native toolbar and buttons on mac!

entry.title: Limelight 0.61 (build 1577)
entry.content: Fix quit on windows

entry.title: Limelight 0.62 (build 1580)
entry.content: Blank button now works before anything has been displayed

entry.title: Limelight 0.63 (build 1590)
entry.content: Generic open for playlist and handled files

entry.title: Limelight 0.64 (build 1633)
entry.content: Fixed exporting of slides as images when changing from one file type to another.

entry.title: Limelight 0.65 (build 1635)
entry.content: Updated to POI 3.5 for better powerpoint support

entry.title: Limelight 0.66 (build 1666)
entry.content: Fix for quiting on OSX Remote code seems not to be working anymore

entry.title: Limelight 0.67 (build 1670)
entry.content: Made loading time faster

entry.title: Limelight 0.68 (build 1672)
entry.content: Fix for options on windows

entry.title: Limelight 0.69 (build 1693)
entry.content: New export options: Export as PowerPoint Export to iPhoto (Mac Only)

entry.title: Limelight 0.70 (build 1699)
entry.content: Fix double click fullscreen toggle

entry.title: Limelight 0.71 (build 1770)
entry.content: Open Source :-) Fix fullscreen toggle bug Fix error during auto update Supports dragging of files to other programs/desktop Introduce bug when dragging multiple files (to fix)

entry.title: Limelight 0.72 (build 1776)
entry.content: Fix for starting bug introduced in 0.71

entry.title: Limelight 0.73 (build 1824)
entry.content: Fix for fullscreen keys on certain JVMs

entry.title: Limelight 0.74 (build 1828)
entry.content: Even more improved fullscreen behaviour

entry.title: Limelight 0.75 (build 1851)
entry.content: Now shows a black screen on startup on windows Improve window positioning

entry.title: Limelight 0.76 (build 1856)
entry.content: Fix for open/save dialog

entry.title: Limelight 0.77 (build 1871)
entry.content: Supports display over AirPlay to AppleTV
